Verses: 1 idharkuppinbu Movaab Puththirarum, Ammon Puththirarum, Avargalode Ammoniyarukku Appuraththilulla Manusharunkooda Yosabaaththirku Virodhamaai Yuththampanna Vandhaargal.

2 silar Vandhu, Yosabaaththai Nokki: Umakku Virodhamaai Eraalamaana Janangal Kadalukku Akkaraiyilirukkira Seeriyaavilirundhu Varugiraargal; Idho, Avargal Engedhiyaagiya Aasaasondhaamaaril Irukkiraargal Endru Ariviththaargal.
3 appozhudhu Yosabaadh Bayandhu, Karththaraith Thedugiradharku Orumugappattu, Yoodhaavengum Ubavaasaththaik Kooruviththaan
4 appadiye Yoodhaa Janangal Karththaridaththile Sagaayanthedak Koodinaargal; Yoodhaavilulla Ellaap Pattanangalilum Irundhu Avargal Karththaraith Thedavandhaargal.
5 appozhudhu Yosabaadh Karththarudaiya Aalayaththile Pudhuppraagaaraththumugappile, Yoodhaa Janangalum Erusalemiyarum Koodina Sabaiyile Nindru:

6 engal Pidhaakkalin Dhevanaagiya Karththaave, Paralogaththilirukkira Neerallavo Dhevan; Dhevareer Jaadhigaludaiya Raajyangalaiyellaam Aalugiravar; Ummudaiya Karaththile Vallamaiyum Paraakkiramamum Irukkiradhu, Oruvarum Ummodu Edhirththu Nirkak Koodaadhu.

7 engal Dhevanaagiya Neer Ummudaiya Janamaagiya Isravelukku Munbaaga Indha Dhesaththuk Kudigalaith Thuraththivittu Idhai Ummudaiya Snegidhanaagiya Aabiragaamudaiya Sandhadhikku Endraikkumendru Kodukkavillaiyaa?
8 aadhalaal Avargal Inge Kudiyirundhu, Idhile Ummudaiya Naamaththirkendru Oru Parisuththa Sthalaththaik Kattinaargal.

9 engalmel Pattayam, Nyaayadhandanai, Kollainoi, Panjam Mudhalaana Theemaigal Vandhaal, Appozhudhu Ummudaiya Naamam Indha Aalayaththil Vilangugirapadiyaal, Naangal Indha Aalayaththilum Umadhu Sannidhiyilum Vandhunindru, Engal Idukkanil Ummai Nokkik Kooppidugaiyil, Dhevareer Kettu Ratchippeer Endru Solliyirukkiraargal.

10 ippodhum, Idho, Isravelar Egipthudhesaththilirundhu Varugirapodhu, Ammon Puththirar, Movaabiyar, Seyeer Malaiththesaththaarudaiya Seemaigal Vazhiyaaip Poga Neer Uththaravu Kodukkavillai; Aagaiyaal Avargalai Vittuvilagi, Avargalai Naasappaduththaadhirundhaargal.
11 ippodhum, Idho, Avargal Engalukku Nanmaikkuth Theemaiyai Sarikkatti, Dhevareer Engalai Sudhandharikkappannina Ummudaiya Sudhandharaththilirundhu Engalaith Thuraththivida Varugiraargal.

12 engal Dhevane, Avargalai Neer Nyaayantheerkkamaatteero? Engalukku Virodhamaaga Vandha Indha Eraalamaana Koottaththirku Munbaaga Nirka Engalukkup Pelanillai; Naangal Seyyavendiyadhu Innadhendru Engalukkuth Theriyavillai; Aagaiyaal Engal Kangal Ummaiye Nokkikkondirukkiradhu Endraan.
13 yoodhaa Koththiraththaar Anaivarum, Avargal Kuzhandhaigalum, Avargal Penjaadhigalum, Avargal Kumaararunkooda Karththarukku Munbaaga Nindraargal.

14 appozhudhu Sabaiyin Naduvilirukkira Maththaniyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Eyelin Maganaana Penaayaavukkup Pirandha Sagariyaavin Puththiran Yagaasiyel Ennum Aasaappin Puththiraril Oruvanaana Leviyanmel Karththarudaiya Aavi Iranginadhinaal Avan Sonnadhu:

15 sagala Yoodhaa Koththiraththaare, Erusalemin Kudigale, Raajaavaagiya Yosabaaththe, Kelungal; Neengal Andha Eraalamaana Koottaththirku Bayappadaamalum Kalangaamalum Irungal Endru Karththar Ungalukku Sollugiraar; Indha Yuththam Ungaludaiyadhalla, Dhevanudaiyadhu.

16 naalaikku Neengal Avargalukku Virodhamaaip Pongal; Idho, Avargal Sis Ennum Mettuvazhiyaai Varugiraargal; Neengal Avargalai Yeruvel Vanaandharaththirku Edhiraana Pallaththaakkin Kadaiyaandharaththile Kandu Sandhippeergal.

17 indha Yuththaththaip Pannugiravargal Neengal Alla; Yoodhaa Manushare, Erusalem Janangale, Neengal Thariththunindru Karththar Ungalukku Seyyum Ratchippaip Paarungal; Bayappadaamalum Kalangaamalum Irungal; Naalaikku Avargalukku Edhiraagap Purappadungal; Karththar Ungalode Irukkiraar Endraan.
18 appozhudhu Yosabaath Tharaimattum Mugankunindhaan; Sagala Yoodhaa Koththiraththaarum Erusalemin Kudigalum Karththaraip Panindhukollakkarththarukkumunbaagath Thaazhavizhundhaargal.
19 kokaaththiyarin Puththirarilum Koraagiyarin Puththirarilum Irundha Leviyar Ezhundhirundhu, Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththarai Magaa Saththaththode Gembeeramaaith Thudhiththaargal.

20 avargal Adhikaalame Ezhundhirundhu, Thekkovaavin Vanaandharaththirkup Pogap Purappattaargal; Purappadugaiyil Yosabaadh Nindru: Yoodhaave, Erusalemin Kudigale, Kelungal; Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththarai Nambungal, Appozhudhu Nilaippaduveergal; Avarudaiya Theerkkadharisigalai Nambungal, Appozhudhu Siththiperuveergal Endraan.

21 pinbu Avan Janaththode Aalosanaipanni, Parisuththamulla Magakdhuvaththaith Thudhikkavum, Aayudham Anindhavargalukku Munnaaga Nadandhupoi, Karththaraith Thudhiyungal, Avar Kirubai Endrumulladhendru Karththaraip Paadavum, Paadagarai Niruththinaan.

22 avargal Paadith Thudhiseyyath Thodanginapodhu, Yoodhaavukku Virodhamaai Vandhu Padhivirundha Ammon Puththiraraiyum, Movaabiyaraiyum, Seyeer Malaiththesaththaaraiyum, Oruvarukku Virodhamaai Oruvaraik Karththar Ezhumbappanninadhinaal Avargal Vettundu Vizhundhaargal.

23 eppadiyenil, Ammon Puththirarum Movaabiyarum, Seyeer Malaiththesakkudigalai Sangarikkavum Azhikkavum Avargalukku Virodhamaai Ezhumbinaargal; Seyeer Kudigalai Azhiththuth Theerndhapodhu, Thaangalum Thangalil Oruvaraiyoruvar Azhikkaththakkavidhamaaik Kaikalandhaargal.

24 yoodhaa Manushar Vanaandharaththilulla Saamakkoottandaiyile Vandhu, Andha Eraalamaana Koottamirukkum Thikkai Nokkugirapodhu, Idho, Avargal Tharaiyile Vizhundhukidakkira Predhangalaagak Kandaargal; Oruvarum Thappavillai.

25 yosabaaththum Avanudaiya Janangalum Avargal Udaimaigalaik Kollaiyida Vandhapodhu, Avargal Kanda Eraalamaana Porulgalum Predhangalilirundhu Urindhupotta Aadai Aabaranangalum, Thaangal Eduththukkondu Pogak Koodaadhirundhadhu; Moondrunaalaaik Kollaiyittaargal; Adhu Avvalavu Migudhiyaayirundhadhu.
26 naalaam Naalil Poraakkaavile Koodinaargal; Ange Karththarukku Sthoththiram Seluththinaargal; Aadhalaal Avvidaththirku Innaalvaraikkum Irukkirapadi Peraakkaa Ennum Per Thariththaargal.

27 pinbu Karththar Avargalai Avargal Saththurukkalperil Kalikoora Seydhapadiyaal Yoodhaa Manushar Yaavarum Erusalem Janangalum, Avargalukku Munnaale Yosabaaththum Magizhchchiyode Erusalemukkuth Thirumbinaargal.
28 avargal Thamburugalodum Suramandalangalodum Poorigaigalodum Erusalemilirukkira Karththarudaiya Aalayaththirku Vandhaargal.
29 karththar Isravelin Saththurukkalodu Yuththampanninaar Endru Kelvippatta Andhandha Dhesaththu Raajyaththaarmel Dhevanaal Undaana Bayangaramum Vandhadhu.
30 ivvidhamaai Dhevan Sutruppuraththaaraal Yuththamillaadha Ilaippaarudhalai Avanukkuk Kattalaiyittadhinaal, Yosabaaththin Raajyabaaram Amarikkaiyaayirundhadhu.

31 yosabaadh Yoodhaavai Arasaandaan; Avan Raajaavaagirapodhu, Muppaththaindhu Vayadhaayirundhu, Irubaththaindhu Varusham Erusalemil Arasaandaan; Silkiyin Kumaaraththiyaagiya Avanudaiya Thaayinper Asubaal.
32 avan Than Thagappanaagiya Aasaavin Vazhiyile Nadandhu, Adhaivittu Vilagaadhirundhu, Karththarin Paarvaikku Semmaiyaanadhai Seydhaan.
33 aanaalum Medaigal Thagarkkappadavillai; Janangal Thangal Irudhayaththaith Thangal Pidhaakkalin Dhevanukku Innum Neraakkaadhirundhaargal.
34 yosabaaththin Aadhiyandhamaana Matra Varththamaanangal Isravelil Raajaakkalin Pusthagaththil Kandirukkira Aanaaniyin Kumaaranaagiya Yegoovin Vasanangalil Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu.
35 adharkuppinbu Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Yosabaadh Pollaappu Seygiravanaagiya Agasiyaa Ennum Isravelin Raajaavode Thozhamaipanninaan.
36 tharsheesukkup Pogumpadikkuk Kappalgalai Seyya Avanode Koodikkondaan; Appadiye Esiyonkeperile Kappalgalai Seydhaargal.

37 maresaa Ooraanaagiya Thodhaavaanin Kumaaranaana Eliyesar Yosabaaththukku Virodhamaagath Theerkkadharisanam Solli: Neer Agasiyaavode Koodikkondapadiyinaal,karththar Ummudaiya Kiriyaigalai Muriththuppottaar Endraan; Andhak Kappalgal Udaindhupoyitru, Avargal Tharsheesukkup Pogak Koodaamarpoyitru.
